net.cloud.server.file

Class FileServerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.server.file.FileServerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class FileServerThread
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Contains the logic loop for the File Server. Takes care of pulling requests out in turn and handing them off for handling.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private RequestHandler requestHandler
      The object we use to handle requests
      private BlockingQueue<FileRequest<?>> requestQueue
      We'll use a blocking queue to handle request storage for us
      private boolean running
      Flag to determine if the logic loop should be running

      FileServerThread(RequestHandler requestHandler)

      Set the running flag.

      • submit

        public void submit(FileRequest<?> request)
            throws FileRequestException
        Submit a request to eventually be handled by the logic loop.
        Parameters:
        request - The request to eventually handle
        Throws:
        FileRequestException - If the request could not be accepted

      • setRunning

        public void setRunning(boolean runningFlag)
        Set the running flag. Once this is false, it cannot be undone. The logic loop will be stopped.
        Parameters:
        runningFlag - What to set the flag to.
